bt.processor.listener

Class ListenerSource<C extends ProcessingContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.processor.listener.ListenerSource<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Type of processing context

    public class ListenerSource<C extends ProcessingContext>
extends Object
    Accumulates processing event listeners for a particular type of processing context
    Since:
    1.5

      Create an instance of listener source for a particular type of processing context

    • Method Detail

      • getContextType

        public Class<C> getContextType()
        Since:
        1.5

      • addListener

        public void addListener(ProcessingEvent event,
                        BiFunction<C,ProcessingStage<C>,ProcessingStage<C>> listener)
        Add processing event listener. Processing event listener is a generic BiFunction, that accepts the processing context and default next stage and returns the actual next stage (i.e. it can also be considered a router).
        Parameters:
        event - Type of processing event to be notified of
        listener - Routing function
        Since:
        1.5

      • getListeners

        public Collection<BiFunction<C,ProcessingStage<C>,ProcessingStage<C>>> getListeners(ProcessingEvent event)
        Parameters:
        event - Type of processing event
        Returns:
        Collection of listeners, that are interested in being notified of a given event
        Since:
        1.5
